name: platty-staff
description: A community for all the staff at platty

name: platty-tennis
description: A group to share, improve and arrange tennis matches with fellow members of platty.

name: platty-book-club
description: A community for book enthusiasts at platty to discuss and share their favorite reads.

name: platty-cycling
description: A group for cyclists at platty to organize rides and share cycling tips.

name: platty-coding
description: A community for developers and tech enthusiasts at platty to collaborate on projects and share knowledge.

name: platty-gardening
description: A group for gardening enthusiasts at platty to share tips, organize garden visits, and exchange plants.

name: platty-cooking
description: A community for food lovers at platty to share recipes, cooking tips, and organize potluck dinners.

name: platty-art
description: A group for artists and art lovers at platty to share their work, discuss techniques, and organize exhibitions.

name: platty-music
description: A community for musicians and music lovers at platty to share their music, collaborate, and organize jam sessions.

name: platty-photography
description: A group for photographers at platty to share their photos, discuss techniques, and organize photo walks.
